display_long_description:
# GunX: Build Fast. Shoot Faster. Survive the Impossible
GunX is a fast-paced VR shooter built around **precision gun assembly**, high-pressure combat, and intense multiplayer duels. Every fight begins with gun parts and your ability to put a weapon together before anyone else.

[media]




Snap parts into place, rack the slide, load your magazine, and unleash chaos in **PvP, Zombie campaign**, or master the weapon in Shooting Range. Whether you’re battling players across the world or fighting back-to-back with a friend against waves of the undead, GunX keeps your adrenaline spiking from the moment you enter the arena.

[media]

# Online PvP (Duels)
[media]
- Each round starts with a random weapon both players must build.
- Build fast, load up, and eliminate your opponent to score points.
- First player to win best of 3 rounds claims victory.

# Campaign: Zombies and Co-Op
[media]
- Survive relentless waves of zombies in an action-packed campaign.
- Start with basic weapons and unlock stronger guns and upgrades as you progress.
- Face increasingly fast, wild, and deadly enemies each round.
- Use special tools like Molotovs, Pipe Bombs, and Shields to stay alive.
[media]
- Play solo or in 2-player co-op mode.
- Each player has their own assembly desk and resources to manage.
- Coordinate through in-game voice chat, split tasks, and survive together.

GunX isn’t just another VR shooter — it’s a **test of skill, speed, and nerves**.

[media]
